item.title: Travel Agency - BPM
item.description: This mini project comprised of creating a Business Process Map. Due to my domain knowledge a travel agency was created for this case. The project focuses on: Data which would be needed to be collected to measure the effectiveness of processes. How results would be measured. How process effectiveness and efficiency could be improved. Project Files - GitHub Repository link
